sourcesContent:
import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { Router } from '@angular/router'; import { AuthService } from '../../services/auth.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-dashboard', templateUrl: './dashboard.component.html', styleUrls: ['./dashboard.component.css'] }) export class DashboardComponent implements OnInit { userData: any; crudOperations = [ { title: 'View All Users', description: 'Browse and search through all registered users', icon: 'bi bi-people-fill', route: '/users', color: 'primary', action: 'View' }, { title: 'Create New User', description: 'Add a new user to the system', icon: 'bi bi-person-plus-fill', route: '/users/create', color: 'success', action: 'Create' }, { title: 'User Management', description: 'Edit, view, and manage existing users', icon: 'bi bi-gear-fill', route: '/users', color: 'info', action: 'Manage' }, { title: 'My Profile', description: 'View and update your profile information', icon: 'bi bi-person-circle', route: '/profile', color: 'warning', action: 'Profile' }, { title: 'Change Password', description: 'Update your account password securely', icon: 'bi bi-shield-lock-fill', route: '/change-password', color: 'secondary', action: 'Security' }, { title: 'System Overview', description: 'View system statistics and analytics', icon: 'bi bi-graph-up', route: '/users', color: 'dark', action: 'Analytics' } ]; constructor( private router: Router, private authService: AuthService ) { } ngOnInit() { this.userData = this.authService.getUserData(); if (!this.userData) { this.router.navigate(['/login']); } } navigateTo(route: string) { this.router.navigate([route]); } logout() { if (this.userData) { this.authService.logout(this.userData.username).subscribe({ next: () => { this.authService.clearUserData(); this.router.navigate(['/login']); }, error: () => { this.authService.clearUserData(); this.router.navigate(['/login']); } }); } } }
